about_the_game:
In PalSync, synchronization isn't just a strategy – it's your only way forward! Control two characters who move at the same time, facing challenges where every action impacts both. Can you keep them in sync and guide them to the finish?

Each level presents obstacles and puzzles designed to test your ability to move both characters simultaneously. As the challenges ramp up, precise control and smart decision-making are essential.

Key Features:

  • Total Synchronization: Both characters can only move together. Every move affects them both, creating a unique challenge where coordination is everything.

  • Level-based Challenges: Tackle a variety of puzzles and obstacles that require you to manage two paths at once.

  • Single-player Experience: You're in control of both characters, offering a focused experience designed for one player.

  • Synchronized Puzzles: The key to beating each level is moving both characters at the same time, facing puzzles that test your real-time decision-making.

In PalSync, the real challenge is moving as one. Do you have what it takes to sync every step and lead both characters to victory?

name: PalSync

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 8, 10, 11
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Storage: 80 MB available space

short_description: In PalSync, control two characters who must move together at the same time. Face challenging levels where perfect synchronization is key to solving puzzles and overcoming obstacles. Test your coordination skills in this unique single-player experience!
